title: What are your new NBA obsessions thus far? | The Answer
description:
Chris Ryan is joined by the Ringer’s Bill Simmons to discuss early season things that they are obsessed with including Collin Sexton, chippy Kevin Durant, and more (01:00). Later, Chris is joined by NBC Sports Warriors reporter Kerith Burke to talk about the many reasons to obsess over the Warriors this season (24:00).
Host: Chris Ryan
Guests: Bill Simmons and Kerith Burke
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
